title: Emerging Market Currencies From Won to Real Jolted by US Policy
description: Some emerging-market currencies were jolted on Wednesday by a series of US policy moves that sent the Brazilian real tumbling and the Korean won to a session high.
content: Some emerging-market currencies were jolted on Wednesday by a series of US policy moves that sent the Brazilian real tumbling and the Korean won to a session high.
